# Overview
Makes posthoc plots for diagnosis of LandR

# Usage

```{r module_usage}
library("SpaDES")
library("future")
library("future.apply")
plan("multiprocess")
# library("usefun")
devtools::load_all(file.path(dirname(getwd()), "usefun")) # Temporary until the simulations finish. Then I need to uncomment the package in the posthocLandR.R

SpaDES.core::setPaths(modulePath = file.path(getwd(), "modules"),
                      cachePath = file.path(getwd(), "cache"))
times <- list(start = 1, end = 1)

Run <- "run1"

parameters <- list(
  posthocLandR = list(
    "years" = c(seq(2011, 2091, by = 10), 2100),
    "saveRAS" = TRUE,
    "overwriteLeadingMap" = FALSE,
    "overwriteBiomassMap" = TRUE,
    "addCaribousuitability" = TRUE,
    "plotFireStats" = FALSE,
    "overwriteBurnSumm" = FALSE
    )
)
modules <- list("posthocLandR")
objects <- list(
  resultsFolders = list(
        LandR.CS_fS = file.path(getwd(), "outputs/23OCT19/LandR.CS_fS", Run),
        LandR.CS_SCFM = file.path(getwd(), "outputs/23OCT19/LandR.CS_SCFM", Run),
        LandR_fS = file.path(getwd(), "outputs/23OCT19/LandR_fS", Run),
        LandR_SCFM = file.path(getwd(), "outputs/23OCT19/LandR_SCFM", Run)
  )
)
inputs <- list()
outputs <- list()

posthocResultsLandR <- simInitAndSpades(times = times, params = parameters, 
                                        modules = modules,
                                        objects = objects, debug = 1)

```
